author: etnu
msg: Initial commit of RpcServlet. This version only handles JSON (no XML), and it's error handling is kind of rough. I've also included a simple demo page showing how you can use the rpc from javascript, though in practice you'll probably actually want to do this from your server-side programming language of choice so that you can inject security tokens and other custom data.
